overview:
A 10+ year veteran of providing business-centric data warehousing and business intelligence solutions for the Fortune 500 and SMBs.

Specializing in healthcare-related business areas including: hospital management, revenue management, coding compliance, risk management, cost allocation, pharmaceutical distribution, supply chain management and purchasing.

Able to help guide a business through the entire process from business concept through to implementation.

Experience with Teradata, Oracle, DB2, SQL Server and MySQL databases; Cognos, MicroStrategy, and Pentaho business intelligence platforms; ER/win, PowerDesigner, Enterprise Manager and plain old Microsoft Excel for data modeling;

Contact info: Business: 615.945.8666 Email: dmcmunn@ipcdesigns.com
